views.intro-section.mantra: Our experts system is your digital marketing
views.intro-section.one-liner-question: Are you a small business in the fashion industry?
views.intro-section.one-liner-descriptio: Signup, upload your products, and we will manage your digital marketing for you

views.about-section.first-point-paragrap: Answer 3 questions so we can better understand your business.
views.about-section.second-point-paragra: We will study your products and will build marketing plan with you
views.about-section.third-point-title: 3 - We will manage the digital marketing for you
views.about-section.third-point-paragrap: It will save you time, and we will probably do it better than you :)
views.about-section.5-minute-paragraph: Dealers is built for simplicity. Sign up and start selling products in a matter of minutes.
views.about-section.facebook-paragraph: Turn your Facebook page into a shopping space with rich media links to your products.
views.about-section.simple-payment-parag: Start using Dealers for free. We only take commissions - no monthly fees.
views.price-plans.standard-plan-descript: We will build a marketing plan on Etsy, Integram or Facebook together with you and will manage it for you
views.price-plans.professional-plan-desc: Reach 3.5 times more potential customers than in the standard plan.
views.price-plans.premium-plan-descripti: Reach 2 times more potential customers than in the standard plan with intensive campaigns management
views.price-plans.no-marketing-plan-desc: We will create a custom made campaign to sell and promote your products with our marketing solutions. Please contact us at: support@dealers.world
views.register-price-plans.title: Choose a marketing plan so we can help you reach the right customers.
views.register-price-plans.tip: You will not pay now since we need to approve your request after you upload your products, so you can change your selection later.
views.about.one-liner: You are 5 minutes away from selling your products online.
views.about.one-paragraph: Dealers is a platform for small and medium-size businesses wishing to sell their products online without the complexity of building and maintaining an online store.
views.about.easy-title: Selling online has never been easier.
views.about.easy-paragraph: With Dealers you can upload your products and start selling online in a matter of minutes. All that's left for you to do is send the products to the customers. We take care of everything else.
views.about.facebook-title: Turn your Facebook page into a shopping space.
views.about.facebook-paragraph: Add beautiful links to your products on your Facebook page or private profile, so people can not only find out about you on the social network, but actually buy from you.
views.about.free-title: We get paid only when you get paid.
views.about.free-paragraph: The nice thing about Dealers is that you pay us only after we help you get paid. We charge 10% for each sale you make - 5% for Dealers and 5% for other fees. All the rest is free.
views.about.support-title: We are here for anything you need.
views.about.support-paragraph-1: Our mission is to help more people expand their income by selling goods online, and we are determined to help you in every step of the way. Feel free to
views.about.support-paragraph-2: if you have a question, problem or feedback. Also check our
views.about.marketing-title: Reach your best potential customers with our smart marketing algorithms.
views.about.marketing-paragraph: We help you sell more with our smart marketing algorithms. These algorithms use business intelligence to introduce and fit your online store to social media and search engines in order to target your best potential customers.
views.about.marketing-plans-title: Sign up and try one of our marketing plans
views.steps.title: How it works, step by step
views.steps.description: Not sure exactly how Dealers works? Here's a full guide from start to finish. If you have any other questions, please do not hesitate -
views.steps.title-1: Sign up and provide your or your business' info.
views.steps.description-1: This includes details such as photo of you or your business, your name, and your bank account info.
views.steps.title-2: You're in! Time to add some products
views.steps.description-2: Once you are signed up as a dealer you'll see a plus icon in the navigation bar. By clicking the icon you can upload a new product: add a photo of the product, tell us about it, choose a price, etc.
views.steps.description-3: Once you uploaded a new product, you can share it on Facebook with a rich media link, whether it's your private profile or business page. By clicking the link, your customers will be directed to the Dealers product page, where they are one step away from purchasing the product.
views.steps.description-4: Now that you have rich media links directing your customers from Facebook to your Dealers product page, you can begin receiving orders online. You'll be notified by email with each new purchase.
views.steps.title-5: Track your sales in your profile
views.steps.description-5: All the sales you made will be listed in your Dealers profile, under the "sales" tab. There you will see all the information regarding each purchase, including quantity, shipping address, and preferred shipping method.
views.steps.title-6: Send your products to your customers
views.steps.description-6-1: All that is left to be done is to send your products. When you upload a product, you can select which delivery methods you support. Dealers offers you a door to door delivery, but you can also add another delivery method, like the official post office.
views.steps.description-6-2: After the product is sent, you can update the status of the purchase to notify the customer that the product is on its way.
views.steps.description-7: At the end of each month, you receive the total income of all the "completed" sales you made. A sale is considered completed when one of the following occurs:
views.steps.description-7-1: The customer changed the status of the purchase to "Received"
views.steps.description-7-2: Three weeks have passed since the purchase took place
views.steps.ending-1: That's it! We're always happy to help with any further questions you might have.
views.contact.title: We are here to listen... And help
views.contact.one-liner: Encountered a problem? Have an idea? Feel free to contact us - we will love to hear from you.
views.contact.support-paragraph: If you encountered a problem, let us know and we will help you right away:
views.contact.feedback-paragraph: Have an idea that will make Dealers better? let us know!
views.add-product.variants-tip: Does this product comes in multiple variations like size or color?
views.shipping-methods.shipping-tip: Specify the available shipping methods for this product.
views.shipping-methods.dealers-warning-2: for this shipping method. The purpose of this shipping price field is only to enable you to present a different shipping price for your customers.
views.shipping-methods.dealers-tip-1: From door to door shipping. Under our responsibility, you'll be charged ₪35. Up to 2 business days.
views.shipping-methods.dealers-tip-3: Free shipping is more appealing to customers. Consider including the price of the shipping in the price of this product and setting the shipping price to 0.
views.shipping-methods.custom-tip-1: A shipping method that you supply. We do not take responsibility for this. Specify a shipping price and the ETD, and a short description (recommended).
views.shipping-methods.custom-descriptio: Such as the shipping company and a link to additional info
views.shipping-methods.pickup-descriptio: Such as address, visiting hours, etc.
services.shipping-methods.dealers-descri: This is the standard express shipping.
services.shipping-methods.pickup-descrip: Customers can come to your location and collect the product. Specify details such as address, hours of availability, etc.
